channel.title: Very annoying , cant log into testscape
channel.description:
ok , i put my username , password , then i put "localhost"
, then it says "cannot connect to server , must be down."
I have testscape server running , i have tried it with my ip address also.
[br][size=1]Posted at: September 05, 2006, 11:34:17 AM[/size][hr]anyone?[br][size=1]Posted at: September 05, 2006, 11:52:42 AM[/size][hr]bump[br][size=1]Posted at: September 05, 2006, 12:27:20 PM[/size][hr][b]fixed i just noticed 127.0.0.1 is localhost :|[/b]
